content.question: <math alttext="G D P" display="inline" overflow="scroll"><mstyle><mrow><mtext>GDP</mtext></mrow></mstyle></math> does NOT account for which of the following?

choices.label: The value added by all firms in the economy
Wages, rent, profit, and interest payments
The value of final goods and services produced domestically

unit.text: 2: Economic Indicators and the Business Cycle

skill.text: Skill 1.D: Describe the similarities, differences, and limitations of economic concepts, principles, or models.
